Dependencies needed :
---------------------

SiftGPU v360:
-------------

- Download and extract SiftGPU from http://www.cs.unc.edu/~ccwu/siftgpu/

- Resulting folder after extraction:
	$(SolutionDir)\Dependencies\SiftGPU\vc\SiftGPU\SiftGPU.vcproj

Ogre3D v1.7.x:
--------------

- You can downdload Ogre3D from http://www.ogre3d.org/
- Install the 32-bit SDK wherether you want then you just need to update the $(SolutionDir)\Ogre.vsprops with your SDK location.
